author: namapane
body:
#### PR description:

- Update MF regression code to use binary files from standard data path, cf. [PR in cms-data](https://github.com/cms-data/MagneticField-Engine/pull/1);
- regression.py updated with command-line arguments to cover all possible cases. (This is intended to be added as a unit test in a next PR);
- Fix some loose ends of other PRs:
   - Added consumes to DDCompactViewMFESProducer; cf. conversation in #28346
   - Remove SimPPS/PPSPixelDigiProducer/test/FromGun2DigiAnal_.py as discussed in #28280

#### PR validation:

Ran regression tests against earlier regression files (produced in past CMSSW releases) for all possible combinations of era, current, and MF producer type.
title: MF standardized regression tests + fix some loose ends in MF
